```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)
library(quantreg)
library(tidyverse)
library(dlookr)
library(broom)
library(DataExplorer)
library(here)
library(ggridges)
library(shiny)

bslib::bs_themer()

custom_palette <- c("#9F4576", "#607B8B")

data <- read_csv(here("Dados/nces330_20.csv"), col_types = "iccccd") %>%
  rename(cost = "Value") %>%
  rename_with(.fn = str_to_lower)
```

### Chart A

```{r}
selectInput("num_var", label = "Escolha a variável", choices = c("type", "length", "expense"), selected = "type")

renderPlot({
  data %>% 
  ggplot(aes(cost, input$num_var, fill = input$num_var)) +
  ggridges::geom_density_ridges(scale = 0.8, alpha = 0.75, color = NA) +
  geom_boxplot(width = 0.12, color = "white",
               outlier.color = NA, size = 0.8) +
  scale_x_continuous(labels = scales::dollar, n.breaks = 6) +
  scale_fill_manual(values = c("#192D45", "#748CDB", "#163B88", "#C1DFF9")) +
  labs(x='',y='', fill='')
})


```
